enchantment.trnightmare.aegis.desc: A shield should stop all damage.
enchantment.trnightmare.armor_breaker.de: Deals bonus damage to enemies with more armor than you.
enchantment.trnightmare.black_blade.desc: A cursed enchantment that trades sanity for great power.
enchantment.trnightmare.charity.desc: §dA portion of your healing spreads to nearby allies.
enchantment.trnightmare.corrosive_weapon: Weakens armor and defenses over time with each strike.
Inflicts shadow damage that bypasses light-based resistances.
enchantment.trnightmare.drill_tip.desc: Pierces through armor and blocks with ease.
enchantment.trnightmare.elemental_pierce: Allows attacks to partially ignore elemental resistances.
enchantment.trnightmare.envy.desc: §2Copies a portion of your target’s buffs.
enchantment.trnightmare.flame_weapon.des: Ignites enemies with searing flames that deal damage over time.
enchantment.trnightmare.genesis_grade.de: A mysterious power beyond logic and limits. Grants overwhelming transcendence.
enchantment.trnightmare.gluttony.desc: §4Restores a small amount of hunger when dealing damage.
enchantment.trnightmare.god_grade.desc: Makes the weapon unbreakable and boosts damage based on stored EP.
enchantment.trnightmare.godly.desc: Empowers the weapon with divine force.
enchantment.trnightmare.gravity_weapon.d: Crushes targets under immense gravitational force, slowing them down.
enchantment.trnightmare.greedy.desc: §6Increases item and XP drops from enemies.
enchantment.trnightmare.hope.desc: §aRestores a portion of health upon surviving a fatal hit.
enchantment.trnightmare.ice_weapon.desc: Imbues the weapon with freezing damage that slows enemies.
enchantment.trnightmare.knowledge.desc: §bGrants bonus experience and insight into enemies.
enchantment.trnightmare.life_eater.desc: Drains a portion of the target's life and restores yours.
enchantment.trnightmare.light_weapon.des: Infuses your weapon with divine light to burn away evil.
enchantment.trnightmare.nuclear_weapon.d: Causes explosive damage with a radiation effect.
enchantment.trnightmare.patience.desc: §eIncreases damage the longer you wait between attacks.
enchantment.trnightmare.pride.desc: §5Boosts power significantly when at full health.
enchantment.trnightmare.purity.desc: §fCleanses negative effects and boosts holy damage.
enchantment.trnightmare.reaper.desc: Increases the weapon's damage along with damage dealt to armor at the cost of durability.
enchantment.trnightmare.reaver.desc: Greatly increases damage against weakened enemies.
enchantment.trnightmare.storm_weapon.des: Electrocutes targets and may summon lightning strikes on hit.
enchantment.trnightmare.stormbringer.des: Calls upon a cataclysmic storm to smite enemies with thunderous fury.
enchantment.trnightmare.vows.desc: §6Allows for owns Oath to cut through something...limitless.
enchantment.trnightmare.wind_weapon.desc: Slashes through the air, dealing swift and cutting wind damage.
enchantment.trnightmare.wrath.desc: §4Increases attack power the more anger you have.
item.trnightmare.elder_essence.tooltip: A fragment of an ancient soul, forgotten strength... Desirable strength.
item.trnightmare.ender_essence.tooltip: Warped power from the void beyond.
item.trnightmare.holy_essence.tooltip: A symbol of peace brought by death.
item.trnightmare.soul_essence.tooltip: A soul hums with lingering life essence.
nodens.scythe: Your scythe has called from the darkness
nodens.world: Your blade, forged from the abyss..
release.skill.saint_chi.description: A radiant energy form that enhances healing, purification, and spiritual resistance.
skill.holy_demonic_inversion.failed_poss: Target is too strong to possess.
tensura.mob_effect.acceleration.desc: Doubles attack speed and teleports you to enemies when attacking.
tensura.mob_effect.kinetic.desc: Reduces movement speed by 10% per level.
tensura.mob_effect.survival.desc: Reduces all damage taken by 50% and halves spiritual damage.
tensura.skill.no_eligible_to_copy: You've failed to copy a skill.
trnightmare.absorb.fail: This target is too pathetic now...
trnightmare.cultist.absorb_ep: §5You have absorbed EP from your slain follower. §d+{0} EP
trnightmare.cultist.bless.max_level: §7This item has reached the maximum Soul Eater level.
trnightmare.cultist.bless.no_item: §7You must hold an item to bless it.
trnightmare.cultist.bless.success: §dYour offering is accepted. Soul Eater level is now §5{0}
trnightmare.element.assign: You have been attuned to the element: %s
trnightmare.element.none: You do not have an element assigned.
trnightmare.godclass.full: §cThis God-Class skill already has the maximum number of owners.
trnightmare.godclass.list.empty: No God-Class skills are currently assigned.
trnightmare.godclass.not: That is not a God-Class skill.
trnightmare.marie.eat.cursed: Marie: You just ate *that*? You deserve the stomachache, honestly.
trnightmare.marie.eat.golden: Marie: Hah. Finally, a morsel worthy of royalty. Try to keep it up.
trnightmare.marie.ep_gain.large: Marie: Now *that’s* the brutality I like to see.
trnightmare.marie.ep_gain.small.0: Marie: Was that supposed to be impressive?
trnightmare.marie.ep_gain.small.1: Marie: Oh. It squeaked and died. How thrilling.
trnightmare.marie.ep_gain.small.2: Marie: A victory, technically. I suppose congratulations are in order?
trnightmare.marie.sass.idle: Marie: Well? Entertain me, or I may just nap again.
trnightmare.marie.snark.breaking_block: Marie: Are you planning to dig your way to competence?
trnightmare.marie.snark.comment_0: Marie: At this rate, even a slime could kill you.
trnightmare.marie.snark.comment_1: Marie: You know, I *could* be helping someone more competent.
trnightmare.marie.snark.comment_2: Marie: Still breathing? Hm. Impressive… barely.
trnightmare.marie.snark.death: Marie: Dead? Hah. Pathetic. At least try to make it interesting next time.
trnightmare.marie.snark.eating.0: Marie: You’re eating again? Gluttony doesn’t suit you.
trnightmare.marie.snark.eating.1: Marie: Try not to choke. Or do. I’m not stopping you.
trnightmare.marie.support.low_hp: Marie: Ugh. You're falling apart—do try to maintain basic survival standards.
trnightmare.menu.laguna_give.title: Grant Divine Protections
trnightmare.menu.laguna_self.title: Choose Divine Protections
trnightmare.menu.odd_laguna_give.title: Grant Divine Protections
trnightmare.menu.odd_laguna_self.title: Choose Divine Protections
trnightmare.michael.comment.break_block: You broke that with some intent, didn't you?
trnightmare.michael.comment.death.betray: You were slain by another bearer... Treachery!
trnightmare.michael.comment.death.final: %s has fallen. The light dims for now.
trnightmare.michael.comment.eat.divine: You taste the essence of divinity itself.
trnightmare.michael.comment.eat.golden: The apple of kings... a fitting choice.
trnightmare.michael.comment.eat.misc_1: That should hold you for now.
trnightmare.michael.comment.low_hp: You're barely hanging on. Be careful.
trnightmare.michael.judgment.kill.betray: You struck down one you once trusted. Betrayal echoes.
trnightmare.michael.judgment.kill.grace: A fallen was laid to rest. Grace has been given.
trnightmare.michael.judgment.kill.peace: Their hands were clean... Peace was an option.
trnightmare.michael.judgment.kill.war: A vassal has fallen. So the war continues.
trnightmare.michaelmem.passive.0: The stars once aligned for you.
trnightmare.michaelmem.passive.2: You carry the weight of the divine king.
trnightmare.odd_laguna.death: No... my child... return to me when you are able.
trnightmare.odd_laguna.eat.0: Don’t forget to savor the little things.
trnightmare.odd_laguna.idle.1: The world watches you with warmth.
trnightmare.odd_laguna.kill.0: That one sought to harm you... I understand.
trnightmare.odd_laguna.kill.1: You fight bravely, but do not lose yourself.
They were part of the harmony... please be gentle.
trnightmare.race.abyss_lord.notes: A lord of the abyss, destoryer of all
trnightmare.race.abyssling.notes: A entity of the void fully stable and ready to wreak havoc
trnightmare.race.anchored_being.notes: A being now anchored by reality and no longer tied to the void
trnightmare.race.apewolf.description: §7Apewolf — tall, wolf‑faced, monkey‑limbed fiends with horns, covered in fur and capable of devastating entire platoons.§r§7
trnightmare.race.demon_king.description: §d§lYou are he who holds the highest title among all the Demon Clan, alongside the incomparable power to bestow the Ten Commandments upon those lesser than you.
trnightmare.race.fiend_drake.description:
§4Fiend Drakes §8are usually weaker monsters; however, they possess immense potential. Should one gain proper sentience, it could easily become an §cSSS Class Calamity§8.

Notable features of the Fiend Drakes are their strange §0black scales§8. While flat by default, these scales can shift into an upright position—typically only seen in evolved forms like the §5Abyss Scourge§8, who utilize the §0Black Dragon Armor §8skill.

More notably, they can naturally wield §0Black Lightning §8and §cFlame§8 through proper evolution. They also seem to be greatly §5adored by Dark Spirits§8.

§7It should be noted that despite their power, most Fiend Drakes are physically frail.
trnightmare.race.giant.description: §6Sturdy humanoids standing 2–2.5 Meters at rest (far larger in battle), with immense strength and occasional innate resistance to magic.§r§7
trnightmare.race.lesser_fairy_race.descr: §aFairies are naturally born within nature, specificly from the plants that grow around the Sacred Tree, or even the Sacred Tree itself.
trnightmare.race.lesser_giant_clan.descr: §nThe Giants are identical to humans with the exception that they are much larger in size. Their way of dress is similar to that of a Savage Tribe.
trnightmare.race.lesser_harpy.descriptio: §7A member of the Harpy race — bird‑like humanoids with retractable wings and talons, capable of passing as human yet built for flight and aerial combat.§r§7
trnightmare.race.lower_class_demon.descr: A member of the §4Demon Clan§r§7, a warring race that wants nothing but to purposefully serve the §5§l§kDemon King§r§7.
trnightmare.race.lower_class_goddess.des: §6The Goddess Clan are the Children of the §fSupreme Being §6and are §qworshipped §6and §ipraised by the other races, or, §4feared §6and §4hated §6by them. The Goddess Clan are seen as the ultimate beings of §spurity and creatures of §uvirtue,
trnightmare.race.meister.description: §7Meisters are elite warriors trained at the §8Death Weapon Meister Academy§7, partnered with living §bWeapons§7 to hunt corrupted souls and witches. Their goal: to create a §6Death Scythe§7 worthy of serving Lord Death.
trnightmare.race.origin_dragon.descripti: §6e§lHow.. no more should be capable of being born.
trnightmare.race.otsutsuki.description: §bThe §eOtsutsuki §7are a mysterious and powerful race originating from beyond the stars, known for their §dcelestial abilities §7and manipulation of §cchakra§7.
trnightmare.race.pitch_elf.notes: §aPitch Elves are Hybrid-Spirits descendants of the Wind and Darkness Elements. They are innate creatures of Magic.
trnightmare.race.sage_beast.description: §aSage Beasts §7are a species of §6Beastfolk §7who have specialized in the usage and expanding of §bAura§7.
trnightmare.race.soul_weapon.description: §7The §6Soul §bWeapons§7 are said to be a §osub-species§r§7 of humans born to strike down the evil of the world in the hands of their §eMeister§7.
trnightmare.race.vivid_elf.notes: §aVivid Elves are Hybrid-Spirits descendants of the Wind and Light Elements. They are innate creatures of Magic.
trnightmare.race.void_spawn.notes: A spawn of the void, however the real world is not easy to survive
trnightmare.skill.acceleration.descripti: §7Acceleration is a skill which can amplify and boost §c'Simple Flame Magic'§7 into something much greater. Through the process of acceleration, everything begins to move faster, burn faster....
trnightmare.skill.accelerator.descriptio: §bAccelerator is a Unique Skill granting absolute control over motion and force. With this skill, the user can redirect or amplify kinetic energy, allowing them to move at blinding speeds, repel attacks, and crush enemies with overwhelming force. It's a power rooted in physics, making the user an unstoppable force of inertia and impact.
trnightmare.skill.acnologia.description: §8Harness the §4apocalyptic§8 powers of the §3ancient dragons§8 slain and devoured to allow one to dominate §6time §8and §dspace§8.
trnightmare.skill.adonai.description: §7Adonai, §6Lord of Majesty §7is the skill used to control the very concept of §bInfinity
trnightmare.skill.adonai.obtainment: §8Adonai, §6Lord of Majesty §8has evolved from §3Infinity Prison§8, §aGreat Sage§8 and §cTyrant
trnightmare.skill.anchor_wave.descriptio: Release a reality enforcing wave, restricting unnatural movement
trnightmare.skill.aphrodite.description: §7Charm the battlefield. Control minds, manipulate souls, and make even death a gift of love.
trnightmare.skill.apo.description: §3Apotheosis is a special form of Holy Skill capable of releasing the latent power of the Divine Creatures..
trnightmare.skill.archimedes.description: §7Solve fate with perfect logic. Control space, calculation, and redefine the rules of reality.
trnightmare.skill.asmodeus.description: §5Asmodeus, Lord Of Lust §3is a powerful Ultimate Skill capable of bending the rules of §fLife §3and §0Death
trnightmare.skill.assault_mode.descripti: Assault Mode is an native power to the Royals of the Demon Clan that allow them to thrive in combat, This ability releases their surpressed Demonic Power in order to slaughter their foes.
trnightmare.skill.astral_grasp.descripti: Use the souls you have collected to inflict punishment
trnightmare.skill.astral_purification.de: Purify those you care about and protect them
trnightmare.skill.bacchus.description: §dYour broken realm has taken root in reality—§4They still watch§d, but now you can hear their §5song§d echoing through the cracks.
trnightmare.skill.bacchus.drunken: {0} has been driven into a drunken delirium.
trnightmare.skill.bacchus.rage_trigger: You fly into an intoxicated rage!
trnightmare.skill.bael.description: §5Bael, Lord of Fear §3is the evolved form of §6Fallen One§3, a §5Unique Skill §3that embodies domination through dread. His power distorts the battlefield with overwhelming fear, soul erosion, and shadow-bound servitude.
trnightmare.skill.bael.evolution_success: §5Bael, Lord of Fear §3has evolved from §6Fallen One
trnightmare.skill.ban.description: §4Ban, Lord of Bandits §3is the evolved form of the Unique Skill §4Snatch. As both an Enchantment-Type and Stealth-Type ability, it allows the user to §0“rob” §3objects, power, and essence itself—without ever laying a finger on the target. This §8intangible force §3slips through §9barriers, §7armor, and §8defenses, making it §4devastating §3in the hands of a true master. No longer just a skill, Ban is a §cliving transgression against reality itself, §3where theft becomes domination.
trnightmare.skill.beleth.description: §4Beleth, Lord of Vendetta §3is a §dSupreme Ultimate Skill §3that governs §cRevenge§3, §9Reason§3, and §8Death§3. §3The power of §4Beleth, Lord of Vendetta §3burns with an unquenchable rage, driving the soul to enact perfect retribution and cold judgment. For in the balance between wrath and logic lies the true path to the §9Source Of Destruction§3.
trnightmare.skill.beleth.obtainment: §6Obtain by transcending the limits of reality and causality, awakening the §dLaw of Reality§6
trnightmare.skill.black_dragon_armor.des: §7Envelops the user in a shell of §0dark§7, draconic scale and armor, boosting your defense and resistance to §cmagic and mental assaults§7.
trnightmare.skill.black_flame_thunder.de: §8Black §4Flame §eThunder §7is the fused skill of §4Black Flame's §8Coating§7 applied with the properties of §8Black §9Lightning§7 to produce a greater §cOffensive Threat§7.
trnightmare.skill.cadence.description: §7A supreme form of temporal control. The user passively accumulates moments of damage and rewinds all harm every §b60 seconds§7—including §ccooked§7, §4severed§7, and §9soul-bound§7 wounds. Projectiles freeze in place before impact, and enemies are locked in a §8flash-frozen§7 state, unable to act. Stasis is not resistance—it's §otime itself refusing to move§7.
trnightmare.skill.calamity_chi.descripti: An unstable, catastrophic energy born from destruction and chaos, devastating all in its path.
trnightmare.skill.camael.description: §7Calls upon the valor of §cCamael§7, empowering the user with unmatched bravery. Strength surges in the face of danger, and fear is burned away by righteous fury.
trnightmare.skill.cess_required: §7You lack the final piece in order to produce §b§lEternal World§7. The key to §btrue fixation§7, §btrue stillness§7, §f§oit§7self: §7§otrue §f§ocessation§7.
trnightmare.skill.coffin_of_darkness.des: §3Coffin of Darkness is a terrifyingly powerful §5Enchantment-Type Unique Skill §3that draws from the darkest knowledge of the Demon Clan. Its abilities are so dangerous and overwhelming that even high-ranking §6Goddess-Clan §3and §cDemon-Clan §3consider it §l§4forbidden §3and §u§lunstable.
trnightmare.skill.copy_not_allowed: §4You're not allowed to copy this skill.
trnightmare.skill.creation.description: §3Creation is a Shifting-Type Unique Skill that grants the user complete dominion over the land beneath their feet. With it, they can reshape terrain, raise mountains, and carve valleys at will.
trnightmare.skill.creator_required: In order to use this... I think need something to evolve it further.
trnightmare.skill.crown.description: The skill hangs itself on the very threads of good and evil, unable to bend, break or cease this balance without causing a total disruption within all that you love... What do you do?
trnightmare.skill.cthulhu.description: §7The Fusion of §dGabriel§7 and §3Leviathan§7, this §6Ultimate Skill§7 is the apex of §bcontrol§7.
trnightmare.skill.cultist.description: §dThis is §5worship§d! §4Desire§d! §5Obsession§d in its purest of forms! §cManifested§d!
trnightmare.skill.cultist.yield_kill: §cYou offered blood and soul. SP is now §4{0}
trnightmare.skill.cursed_poison.descript: §0Cursed §5Poison §7is a skill that allows one to create a toxin so deadly, not even True Dragon's are immune to it.
trnightmare.skill.dark_blessing.descript: Embrace the void. A blessing that draws power from shadows, enhancing resilience and cursing those who oppose you.
trnightmare.skill.dark_chi.description: A corrupted force that empowers curses, decay, and soul erosion.
trnightmare.skill.deathman.description: §7Deathman is a special form of Necromancy capable of bringing a powerful corpse.
trnightmare.skill.deluge.description: §7Deluge is a §bbody-altering§7 skill that grants mastery over the §9very nature of water§7, adapting its form between §ahealing§7 and §cdestruction§7.
trnightmare.skill.demonic_power.descript: Darken my soul, for it is power I crave.
trnightmare.skill.deus.obtainment: §cReverser§r has evolved into §4Deus Ex Machina, Lord of Machine Gods§r.
trnightmare.skill.deus_ex_machina: §4Deus Ex Machina, Lord of Machine God
trnightmare.skill.deus_ex_machina.descri: §4A chaotic §6Ultimate Skill§r§4 that governs §7matter§4, §8structure§4, and §7inorganic manipulation§4. Grants authority over §6minerals§4, convergence of what §cIS§4 to make what §cSHOULD NOT§4, and the ability to ensure dominion over the will of §d'Godly Metals'§4.
trnightmare.skill.dice_dice_dice.descrip: You love to gamble. Dice Dice Dice. Roll the Dice. Surrender your life to the rush
trnightmare.skill.disaster.description: §dDisaster is a Shifting-Type Unique Skill tied to the Fairy Kings' power—capable of manipulating the balance of life and death. This skill allows the user to drastically alter the natural course of things. Minor injuries turn critical, benign substances become deadly, and life can be fostered or extinguished at will. With dominion over nature, the user can spur vast forests into bloom or command decay and ruin.
trnightmare.skill.divide.description: §7These claws can §csever§7 anything — space, matter, or even concepts — leaving nothing behind.
trnightmare.skill.djibril.ascension.not_: Not enough stored energy to Ascend!
trnightmare.skill.dominator.description: §7Command Heaven itself. Take the throne, seize control, and claim their skills as your own.
trnightmare.skill.durability.description: Grants immense toughness and stamina. Endure what others cannot, and keep fighting when others fall.
trnightmare.skill.earth_blessing.descrip: Steadfast and unyielding, this blessing reinforces your defense and grants a deep connection to nature’s strength.
trnightmare.skill.elegy.description: §7Easily mistaken as a §dNecromantic§7 ability, Elegy is a §9Space-Time Manipulation§7 power with such §o§bfinite control§r§7 that one could §brewind§7 an individual's §cdeath§7.
trnightmare.skill.elementalist.descripti: §7You are one with the elements, harnessing the power of each as you so choose.
trnightmare.skill.escanor.description: §6Escanor, Lord Of The Sun §3is a Ultimate Skill of the §cDestruction §3and §eEnchantment §3Types. It radiates overwhelming heat and light, reaching its peak at noon. During this time, the user's destructive power and enchanted abilities surge to their maximum potential, turning them into an unstoppable force under the daylight.
trnightmare.skill.evolution.arroganz_ran: §cYou lack mastery of §4{0}§c — the required Arroganz-enhanced skill.
trnightmare.skill.evolution_failed: You lack the clarity required for evolution.
trnightmare.skill.faith.description: §5Faith §3is an Enchantment and Destruction Hybrid Type Unique Skill, which was unifed with the §5§l§kDemon King's power §3in order to produce the Commandment Of §5Faith. §3In which, all who display faithlessness shall be set ablaze.
trnightmare.skill.fallen_one.description: §4Fallen One §3is a fearsome Unique Skill that exerts spiritual domination through despair. Its user is permanently empowered and can enslave the dead, harvest the living, and crush subordinates to unleash overwhelming power. Spirits fear its very existence.
trnightmare.skill.fighterwargod.descript: A fighter forged in war. Not to be confused with Fighter
trnightmare.skill.fire_blessing.descript: A blessing of flame and fury. Empower your attacks with burning force and ignite the battlefield.
trnightmare.skill.flame_dragon.descripti: §cUnleash the wrath of the fire dragon! with searing claws and wings forged in a living blaze.
trnightmare.skill.flash.description: §7§eLet there be light§7 — The embodiment of divine light. Flash grants §elight-speed movement§7, §6holy power§7, and §fblinding strikes§7 that overwhelm the darkness. The Blade Of The Supreme Diety
trnightmare.skill.food_lover.description: A lighthearted yet practical skill. Greatly increases benefits from food and restores health more efficiently.
trnightmare.skill.forbidden_knowledge.de: You have gazed into the void and the void gazes back. You learn skills much faster
trnightmare.skill.gabriel.description: §bGabriel, Lord of Patience§f is the Ultimate Skill of §9fixation§f, §7stillness§f, and §8unshakable control§f. It halts motion, silences chaos, and overwhelms aggression with absolute calm. In its presence, even time seems to hesitate.
trnightmare.skill.giant_dance,descriptio: §3Heavy Metal is a special defensive skill used by the Giant Clan.
trnightmare.skill.godclass.limit_reached: §cThis God-Class skill already has the maximum number of owners.
trnightmare.skill.grimoire.description: Grimoire is the Book of Magic, an Ultimate Gift which allows one the access to truly master all of Magic
trnightmare.skill.grimoire_book_of_magic: §dYou have obtained the Book of Magic!
trnightmare.skill.harvester.must_shift_t: You must shift to scan in Thief mode.
trnightmare.skill.heavenly_king.descript: §bYou reign over all that is §eholy§b, using your powers to the fullest benefit of your comrades.
trnightmare.skill.heavy_metal,descriptio: §3The Giant Clan live intune with the Earth itself, and when they dance in rhythm they gain the power.
trnightmare.skill.hellblaze.description: §5§lHellblaze is a special Destruction-Class Intrinsic Skill of the Demon Clan.
trnightmare.skill.hellblaze_dragon_armor: §7Ignites the body in cursed §4hellfire§7 and draconic fury, granting immunity to fire and unleashing burning retaliation against attackers.
trnightmare.skill.hidden_void.descriptio: Wrap yourself in a blanket of void to hide
trnightmare.skill.holy_chant.description: Channel the words of the divine
trnightmare.skill.holy_demonic_inversion: The ability to flip the coin and get the desired side.
trnightmare.skill.hubris.description: Your pride has grown into hubris
trnightmare.skill.infinity.description: §3Infinity is a unique and incredibly powerful Enchantment-Type Unique Skill. Its effects are so outside the norm of most magic, that it's been called §4unfair §3and §echeating.
trnightmare.skill.insufficient_magicule: You don't have enough magicules to perform this action!
trnightmare.skill.inversion.description: Inversion is the very authority over Space itself. You are it's lone ruler
trnightmare.skill.israfil.description: Israfil is the an instrument of authority over space.
trnightmare.skill.jibril.activation.chro: Kinetic Nexus: All motion bends to your will.
trnightmare.skill.jibril.activation.judg: You unleash divine judgment upon the unworthy!
trnightmare.skill.jibril.description: Thou who has absolute control over inertia, movement, vectors, and kinetic forces. That is Jibril, the power of Rigor.
trnightmare.skill.jireh.description: This skill is the very foundation of using the gift of the earth to its truest points.
trnightmare.skill.jireh.unlocked: §6You have unlocked the Ultimate Skill: Jireh!
trnightmare.skill.judicator.description: §5I AM THE STORM THAT IS APPROACHING
trnightmare.skill.kage: §6§lKagetsuchi§r§c, Lord Of Raging Flames, §dUltimate Evolution §7of the Unique Skill, §9Bersek§7. The skill §6§lKagetsuchi§r§c§7 is capable of burning all to ash, and driving ruin to this land
trnightmare.skill.kage.obtainment: §6Unlocked through awakening a burning hatred and surviving the Trial of Embers.
trnightmare.skill.kami.description: §7You lord over the Spirits as their highest authority, using them as you see fit.
trnightmare.skill.karma.description: It's a beautiful day outside. birds are singing, flowers are blooming... on days like these, kids like you... SHOULD BE BURNING IN HELL.
trnightmare.skill.laguna.cooldown: You cannot grant another Divine Protection yet.
trnightmare.skill.laguna.description: A divine skill that bestows blessings unto me! So with this! I’ll show you what it means to be a true hero!
trnightmare.skill.laguna.granted_other: You granted %s the Divine Protection of %s.
trnightmare.skill.laguna.granted_self: You have received the Divine Protection of %s.
trnightmare.skill.laguna.permanent: The divine protection of %s has been made permanent!
trnightmare.skill.laguna.removed: The divine protection of %s has faded.
trnightmare.skill.laguna_child.cooldown: This skill is still on cooldown.
trnightmare.skill.laguna_child.descripti: An evolved divine skill that allows the user to select and grant protective blessings, symbolizing the birthright of a chosen savior.
trnightmare.skill.law_manipulation.descr: §7Command the very fabric of existence, rewriting the rules of reality with will alone.
trnightmare.skill.leonidas.description: §8Leonidas, Lord of Leadership is the embodiment of unwavering strategy and command. §6Lead with honor§8, §bshield your allies§8, and §cstrike with conviction§8. A king not by blood — but by will.
trnightmare.skill.leonidas.obtainment: §7Harness the §6spirit of your loyal soldier§7. Command, protect, and fight with unbreakable resolve — for §9honor§7 and §cglory§7, as your Unique Skill §oSpearhead§r§7 evolves into §cLeonidas, Lord of Leadership§7.
trnightmare.skill.leviathan.description: §2Leviathan, Lord Of Envy §3is capable of §qabsorbing §3the strength of all enemies, §qstealing §3their power to enhance itself, crippling foes with devastating §qeffects§3, and improving its user endlessly by §qstealing §3the might of others.
trnightmare.skill.light_blessing.descrip: A radiant gift that protects and purifies. Enhances healing and weakens darkness around you.
trnightmare.skill.lock.description: §7This skill prevents your skills from being taken via Skill Plundering.
trnightmare.skill.lock2.description: §7This is a modified version of the Lock Skill for CNPCs.
trnightmare.skill.lore_hunter.descriptio: To find the hidden lore of the world
trnightmare.skill.lost.description: When faith falters and the gods go silent, power must be taken by hand
trnightmare.skill.love.description: §5Love §3is an Enchantment Type Unique Skill, which was unifed with the §5§l§kDemon King's power §3in order to produce the Commandment Of §5Love. §3In which, those with hatred in their hearts, are rendered unable to cause harm.
trnightmare.skill.love_locomotive.descri: Get ready to ride the Love Train!
trnightmare.skill.love_locomotive.shield: Love Locomotive: Reflective Love Shield activated!
Love Locomotive: Reflective Love Shield primed!
trnightmare.skill.lucifer.description: §4Lucifer, Lord Of Pride §3is capable of perfectly anything, with the ability of any skill that the user is able to see and then analyze. This is known as §cPerfect Reproduction §3however further more, the §dUltimate Skill §4Lucifer, Lord Of Pride §3is capable of so much more...
trnightmare.skill.lunatic.description: §dYou've torn through the veil of sanity, embracing chaos as truth. §4Madness§d fuels your growth—§5but at the cost of yourself§d.
trnightmare.skill.lunatic.lucidity: You grasp onto a fleeting moment of clarity.
trnightmare.skill.mad_knight.description: A knight who's rage is potent and deadly
trnightmare.skill.magic_regeneration.des: §9Calm thou self. Center thou soul. The rhythm of the sea and sky shall become synchronized.
trnightmare.skill.magical_eye.descriptio: §mThe Magical Eye is a specialized magical ability that allows one to see the rhythm of ones soul.
trnightmare.skill.mammon.description: §6Mammon, Lord of Greed §3is the ultimate evolved Skill of §6Greed§3. §3This powerful skill is capable of stealing even the §aLife §3from its victims. This is truly the manifestation of §6Greed
trnightmare.skill.manas_test.description: A skill used for testing possible Manas
trnightmare.skill.meliodas.description: §4Sign of Calamity is a devastatingly intense §cDestruction §5Enchantment-Type Evolved Skill §4that embodies onces ones unleashed rage and the full might of the §cDemon King’s bloodline§4. Born from your resurrection and liberation from the §6Goddess Amber§4, this skill channels an unstable fusion of demonic fury and ancient cursed magic—so volatile that even §eArchangels§4 and §8Ten Commandments§4 alike fear its §l§0uncontrollable§4 and §l§4apocalyptic§4 nature.
trnightmare.skill.merlin.description: §3§5Mer§1lin is a unique and incredibly powerful Enchantment-Type Ultimate Skill. Its effects are so outside the norm of most magic, that it's been called §4unfair §3and §echeating.
trnightmare.skill.metis.description: Metis is the truly ruler of space itself. Not a single skill can reach its level of control.
trnightmare.skill.michael.description: §7Ascend the Heavenly Throne. Erase chaos, dominate minds, and execute absolute justice. You alone control the circuits, you alone are to be God! Isn't that right.... Master?
trnightmare.skill.mithras.description: §dThrough §5devotion§d and §4sacrifice§d, you become the §5god§d your followers believe in—§cmerciless§d, §6eternal§d, and §lunchained§d.
trnightmare.skill.mithras.obtainment: You have become the newest incarnation of... Mithras....Lord of Sacrifice
trnightmare.skill.mithras.revive: You have returned through a cultist's flesh.
trnightmare.skill.mithras.sacrifice: You have taken everything from your cultists!
§cWhy should they understand? Afflicts a target with confusion and uncertainty.
trnightmare.skill.mode.lunatic.lucid.des: §dA breath of clarity amidst the storm of madness. Reduces your insanity by 1.
trnightmare.skill.mode.lunatic.psychosis: §5Your vision infects others. Nearby entities gain insanity and suffer spiritual damage.
trnightmare.skill.mode.manas.description: §7This is the power of a Digital Lifeform
trnightmare.skill.mode.ruler.description: §7An ominous power that reverses life and death itself.
trnightmare.skill.mode.supreme.descripti: §7An unfathomable power that transcends mortality and logic itself.
trnightmare.skill.moon_domination.descri: §7Harnesses the §5moon's§7 full presence to distort perception, strengthen gravity, and cloak the battlefield in mystic night.
trnightmare.skill.moon_manipulation.desc: §7Allows command over the §bmoon’s§7 reflective and gravitational energies—manipulating tides, illusions, and calm lunar light.
trnightmare.skill.necronomicon.descripti: The Necronomicon is a forbidden tome of godlike duality and psychic ruin. The final evolution of Holy Demonic Inversion.
trnightmare.skill.necronomicon.evolved: You have embraced the forbidden... Necronomicon awakened.
trnightmare.skill.nodens.description: §7Born from the collapse of §4Pride§7, forged in the void between soul and thought, §9Nodens§7 is the incarnation of pure abyssal thought. This §dGod-Class Ultimate Skill§7 cannot be learned, only survived.
trnightmare.skill.nodens.evolution_succe: §4Lucifer, Lord of Pride §chas begun to collapse under the infinite cascade of information. It was not, in truth, an endless well—§oit had a bottom. §cTo preserve yourself, you initiate the forbidden protocol: §6Ego Upload. §7Your innermost essence—your ego ｢§l自我§r§7, jiga｣—is cast into the abyss. §bThe heart core ｢心核ココロ, kokoro｣ shatters, releasing a storm of infons. As your astral body is torn open and overwritten, something far greater begins to take shape... §9Nodens, God of Abyss §chas been born. §9Your body has been reformed. A §dGod-Class Ultimate Skill §chas awakened.
trnightmare.skill.ocean.description: §7§eLet the waters under the sky be gathered to one place§7 — The §bGrace of Ocean§7, bestowed by the Supreme Deity, grants dominion over the tides. Its wielder can §bbecome liquid itself§7, flow past all harm, or unleash §3entire oceans§7 across dimensions. A divine force that drowns despair in waves of overwhelming might.
trnightmare.skill.odd_laguna.cooldown: This skill is still on cooldown.
trnightmare.skill.odd_laguna.description: The enigmatic, final form of Laguna. It grants the power to bestow divine protections and embody the essence of heroic providence.
trnightmare.skill.odd_laguna.error.inval: Invalid or missing target for Divine Protection grant.
trnightmare.skill.odd_laguna.error.must_: You must select exactly 2 Divine Protections to grant.
trnightmare.skill.odd_laguna.error.too_m: You may only choose up to %s Divine Protections.
trnightmare.skill.odd_laguna.granted: You have chosen your Divine Protections.
trnightmare.skill.odd_laguna.invalid_pro: You must select exactly 2 Divine Protections to grant.
trnightmare.skill.odd_laguna.invalid_tar: Invalid or missing target for Divine Protection grant.
trnightmare.skill.odd_laguna.too_many_se: You may only choose up to %s Divine Protections.
trnightmare.skill.optimized_apollio.desc: §7The divine radiance of §6Apollo§7, concentrated into a solar-based arsenal. §dSolar flares§7 and §9radiant overdrive§7 are enhanced through Arroganz for explosive combat supremacy.
trnightmare.skill.optimized_belphegor.de: §7Arroganz §5Belphegor§7, the master of lethargy, this form enhances §dRest Mode§7. Overhealing and MP regen are stored as §dStored Magicules§7, which are unleashed in §aCalm Mode§7 to heal and empower allies with passive efficiency and magical nourishment.
trnightmare.skill.optimized_envy.descrip: §7Harnessing §2envy’s power§7, mimic and disrupt abilities of nearby foes. Skills and traits are copied or inverted for strategic advantage.
trnightmare.skill.optimized_gabriel.desc:
§7Gifted by §bGabriel§7, angel of judgment and fate. This skill distorts causality to your will.

§8[ True Passive ]§7 Prideful Fate: You are immune to all attempts to lower your Max HP or Spiritual HP—such attempts are reflected back onto the attacker.
§8[ Active, Press ]§7 Skill Difference: For §95 seconds§7, any enemy that hits you receives §ctwice§7 the damage and is locked from attacking for the duration.
trnightmare.skill.optimized_infinity.des: An Arroganz-refined form of Infinity Prison, focusing entirely on dimensional fortification through Absolute Guard.
trnightmare.skill.optimized_leviathan.de:
§7Refined by §3Leviathan§7, sovereign of envy. Taps into §dArroganz Mirror§7 and scales based on superiority over your enemy. 

§8[ Passive, In-Slot ]§7 One Above All: Steal a percentage of enemy magicules based on strength difference. Break barriers instantly if their EP is lower than yours.
§8[ True Passive ]§7 Superior: While under §dArroganz Mirror§7, you cannot take more than §c500§7 damage per hit.
§8[ Arroganz Manifestation ]§7: Temporarily boosts stats and grants Arroganz Mirror.
trnightmare.skill.optimized_lust.descrip: §7Seduction and domination through §dspiritual charm§7. Enemies lose willpower while allies gain fervor. The optimized form weaponizes attraction into mental and magical control.
trnightmare.skill.optimized_mammon.descr: §7Optimized through §6Mammon§7, lord of Greed and ambition. Converts wealth and §evalue§7 into offensive and defensive power. Ties into the §4Death Wish§7 when near death, all accumulated energy and gold resources are expended for a final surge of overwhelming force.
trnightmare.skill.optimized_musician.des: §7Music imbued with §dmagicules§7 and §9emotional resonance§7 influences allies and enemies alike. Optimized frequencies disrupt enemy casting while reinforcing friendly morale and stamina.
trnightmare.skill.optimized_shadow.descr: §7A shadow striker enchanted with optimized assassination techniques. §8God-Killer§7.
trnightmare.skill.optimized_sloth.descri: §7An optimized sloth state where §9passive regeneration§7 and §denergy efficiency§7 are maximized, allowing for prolonged survival and durability in any scenario.
trnightmare.skill.optimized_tsukiyomi.de: §7Arroganz has massively enhanced the lethality of §bTsukiyomi§7, stripping away its restraint and control aspects in favor of raw power. The user trades illusion-based dominion for overwhelming spiritual aggression, clone warfare, and high-speed assassination—refining the moon’s shadow into a weapon of absolute execution.
trnightmare.skill.optimized_uriel.descri: By isolating the §bAbsolute Guard§r and following the very concept of §eNova Break§r, through the usage of §cLucifer's Arroganz§r, the §adefensive abilities§r have been improved, and the §coffensive ability§r of §eNova Break§r has been allowed to truly shine.
trnightmare.skill.optimizied_antiskill.d: §7Anti Skill has been modified by §5Lucifer's§7 Arrogan, this nullifies all spiritual and magical forces on contact—§dsealing skills§7, §9suppressing magic§7, and weaponizing negation to counter kinetic force. However due to Lucifer's touch, this can even work with an improved RADIUS.
trnightmare.skill.optimizied_antiskill.o: Through the power of my skill, Lucifer, I have improved yours, Yuuki.
trnightmare.skill.optimizied_satanael.de: §7By isolating the Magicule Breeder Reactor within Satanael through the usage of §5Lucifer’s§7 Arroganz. Absorbs and multiplies §dmagicules§7 through internal fusion, granting infinite stamina and energy—even in a §8stopped world§7. The user becomes a self-sustaining engine of destruction, however to prevent total madness, this power is kept at a finite cap in order to maintain total control.
trnightmare.skill.optimizied_satanael.ob: Through the power of my skill, Lucifer, I have improved yours, Milim.
trnightmare.skill.orobas.description: §5Orobas, Lord of Malevolence §3is a §dSupreme Ultimate Skill §3that governs §9Annihilation§3, §2Corruption§3, and §8Despair§3. §3The power of §5Orobas, Lord of Malevolence §3twists reality itself, embodying the inevitable collapse of all things into oblivion, for total annihilation is the truest display of the §9Source Of Destruction
trnightmare.skill.orobas.obtainment: §6Obtain by transcending the limits of mind and soul, awakening the §dLaw of Evolution§6
trnightmare.skill.piety.description: §0Piety §3is an Enchantment and Destruction Hybrid Type Unique Skill, which was unifed with the §5§l§kDemon King's power §3in order to produce the Commandment Of §0Piety. §3In which, all who turn their backs are less than dirt.
trnightmare.skill.preta.description: §8Pretas, Lord of Hunger is the ability manifested by your §6inability to control your desires§8. You have not become a Buddha, but... §4DON'T LISTEN TO IT!§8 FEED US! §cFEED US MORE!§8 WE HUNGER! WE FEAST UPON THEIR §dPOWER§8!
trnightmare.skill.preta.obtainment: §7Devour §oweakened foes§7 to inherit their §dstrength§7. Your unique skill; Gourmand §5has evolved into §cPretas, Lord of Hunger§7.
trnightmare.skill.providence.description: §bYou reign now as the §6Lord of Divinity§b, bring peace & balance to all who would need it.
trnightmare.skill.pure_heart.blocked_by_: This person... They're not owned or marked by anything... They are... At the apex...
trnightmare.skill.pure_heart.cannot_name: One with a Pure Heart cannot be named.
trnightmare.skill.pure_heart.description: Your body is a temple. Pure in mind, heart and soul
trnightmare.skill.purity.description: §gPurity §3is an EnchantmentType Unique Skill, which was unifed with the §5§l§kDemon King's power §3in order to produce the Commandment Of §gPurity. §3In which, all who commits impure deeds in her presence will be inflicted with illness.
trnightmare.skill.qw.description: §5Quantum Wielder is a Reality-Bending Unique Skill that manipulates quantum states and cosmic principles. The user can shape probabilities, weave energy through spacetime, and collapse possibilities into outcomes. At higher levels, this skill distorts the laws of nature, allowing the user to bend causality and create anomalies beyond comprehension.
trnightmare.skill.reticence.description: §6Reticence §3is an Enchantment and Destruction Hybrid Type Unique Skill, which was unifed with the §5§l§kDemon King's power §3in order to produce the Commandment Of §6Reticence. §Those who expressed hidden feelings or emotions would have their voices §5§l§kblocked.
trnightmare.skill.rigor.description: Rigor is a Unique Skill which controls the flow of energy into the body, every impact is power waiting to be used
trnightmare.skill.rogue.description: A assassin in the shadow of the night
trnightmare.skill.ruler.description: §7Grants absolute control over all effects directed at the user—§5harm becomes healing§7, weakness becomes strength, and §dreality bends§7 to their will.
trnightmare.skill.scavenger.description: §7This §dUnique Skill §7is a §cPredation §7ability with further developed capabilities, allowing one to even predate §eitems§7, §earmor§7 and §egear§7.
trnightmare.skill.scrying.description: Try and find your target through space
trnightmare.skill.selflessness.descripti: §dSeflessness §3is an Enchantment and Curse Type Unique Skill, which was unifed with the §5§l§kDemon King's power §3in order to produce the Commandment Of §dSelflessness. §Or that would happen.... But you're worthless.
trnightmare.skill.shiva.description: §7Channels the cosmic rhythm of §9Shiva§7, weaving destruction and creation in battle. Movements become a deadly dance, striking with divine precision and chaos.
trnightmare.skill.skill_name.description: This is a description for the unique skill. Edit this description using the en_us.json file.
trnightmare.skill.sky_enjoyer.descriptio: A lover of freedom and altitude. Improves movement, jumping, and grants resistance while airborne.
trnightmare.skill.snatch.description: §4Snatch §3is both an Enchantment-Type and Stealth-Type Unique Skill that allows the user to §0“rob” §3objects—and even the abilities of others—without ever laying a finger on them. This §8intangible attack §3slips through §9barriers, §7armor, and §8defenses alike, making it §4lethal §3in the hands of someone who knows how to use it. When wielded correctly, it's less a skill and more a §cviolation of reality.
trnightmare.skill.solomon.description: §0Solomon, Lord Of Genesis §3is a §3is a §dSupreme Ultimate Skill §3that governs §bCreation§3, §bDestruction§3, and §bRebirth§3. §3The power of §0Solomon, Lord Of Genesis §3is so immense that in order to contain it within one's soul, it must be shattered into three pieces. §0Solomon, Lord Of Genesis§3, §4Beleth, Lord of Vendetta §3and §5Orobas, Lord of Malevolence
trnightmare.skill.solomon.obtainment: §6Obtain by transcending the limits of spirit and flesh, awakening the §dLaw of Genesis§6.
trnightmare.skill.sorcerer.description: This spell cost me half my blood but I didn't have to learn it
trnightmare.skill.soul_domination.descri: An evolved art of spiritual control that devours weakened foes and restores spiritual health.
trnightmare.skill.soul_manipulation.desc: A spiritual technique that weakens enemies and consumes their essence.
trnightmare.skill.soul_weapon.descriptio: §7Manifests a §dweapon forged from the soul§7, tailored to its wielder’s spirit and capable of evolving with their strength and resolve.
trnightmare.skill.spatial_anomaly.descri: Wield space and break it. Being able to surpass the limits of physics
trnightmare.skill.stasis.description: §7A supreme form of temporal control. The user passively accumulates moments of damage and rewinds all harm every §b60 seconds§7—including §ccooked§7, §4severed§7, and §9soul-bound§7 wounds. Projectiles freeze in place before impact, and enemies are locked in a §8flash-frozen§7 state, unable to act. Stasis is not resistance—it's §otime itself refusing to move§7.
trnightmare.skill.stasis.obtainment: Through progression, Stasis has evolved into Cadence
trnightmare.skill.steel_dragon_armor.des: §7Summons an armor forged from the essence of a §8steel dragon§7, drastically enhancing durability and turning the user into a walking fortress.
trnightmare.skill.steel_ki_release.descr: §7Unleashes concentrated §7metallic Ki§7 throughout the body, hardening muscles and boosting offensive and defensive power with unbreakable resolve.
trnightmare.skill.stray_archer.descripti: The Dark Gods potential is true within this one...
trnightmare.skill.sun_domination.descrip: §7Unleashes the §6full force§7 of the sun, overwhelming enemies with relentless waves of solar energy, heat, and illumination.
trnightmare.skill.sun_manipulation.descr: §7Grants control over the §esun’s§7 radiance and heat, allowing the user to conjure blinding light, searing flames, and solar force.
trnightmare.skill.sunshine.description: §6Sunshine §3is a Unique Skill of the §cDestruction §3and §eEnchantment §3Types. It radiates overwhelming heat and light, empowering the user as the sun rises, reaching its peak at noon. During this time, the user's destructive power and enchanted abilities surge to their maximum potential, turning them into an unstoppable force under the daylight.
trnightmare.skill.sunshine2.description: §7§eLet there be lights in the vault of sky to separate the day from the night§7 — The embodiment of the sun. Sunshine grants immeasurable power, and the closer to the apex of the sun, the stronger the star of the Supreme Being is
trnightmare.skill.supreme.description: §7Radiates divine majesty, overwhelming foes with blinding §flight§7 and unmatched purity. Grants the user unmatched strength and resistance against all that is §cdark§7.
trnightmare.skill.sword_saint.drawn: Your sword has been drawn by divine instinct!
trnightmare.skill.swordsmen.description: §7Grants peak combat instinct and sword mastery, enabling the user to react instantly and read §eenemy intent§7 in battle.
trnightmare.skill.tornado.description: §7§eLet there be a vault between the waters to separate water from water§7 — The §aGrace of Tornado§7 channels the will of the skies. With wind sharper than any blade and shields that deflect the world itself, the user becomes §3untouchable within the storm§7. A relentless cyclone forged by divine command.
trnightmare.skill.truth.description: §4Truth §3is an Enchantment Type Unique Skill, which was unifed with the §5§l§kDemon King's power §3in order to produce the Commandment Of §4Truth. §3In which, liars are turned to stone, and so will any attempts of deception.
trnightmare.skill.tyche.description: You now yield luck, no longer using it but now abusing it
trnightmare.skill.tyrant.description: §5Tyrant &6is a unique-skill capable of invading peoples minds, and ensuring your success in combat through §5mental invasion and the breaking of one's will.
trnightmare.skill.ultimate_eye.descripti: §9Ultimate Eye §3grants its user perfect insight, the ability to analyze, predict, and execute critical blows with divine precision.
trnightmare.skill.ultimate_shield.descri: §8Ultimate Shield §3provides absolute defense, rendering its bearer nearly invulnerable through adaptive resistance and unbreakable form.
trnightmare.skill.upgrade_success_cthulh: §aYou've created a §lGreater Ultimate Skill§r§a! §bCthulhu§r, §9King of Divine Ice§a has been formed through the optimization and evolution of §3Leviathan§r, §7Lord of Envy§a and §dGabriel§r, §7Lord of Patience§a.
trnightmare.skill.vehement.description: §0People ask, Why do you fight? Why do you kill? Why do you destroy? They will die with these questions unanswered. That is humanity's bliss.
trnightmare.skill.veles.description: §7Veles is the §dUltimate Evolution §7of the Unique Skill, §9Usurper§7. The skill §6Veles §7is capable of §cstealing §7and §agiving§7 as it so pleases, for this is the power of a §eKing§7 — to §ctake§7 all they desire, and to §agive§7 it away as they see fit.
trnightmare.skill.void_whisper.descripti: You release a whisper of the void
trnightmare.skill.warlock.description: You have signed a deal with a god. I wonder with who
trnightmare.skill.water_blessing.descrip: Flowing and adaptive. Increases mobility in water and grants healing under rain or aquatic conditions.
trnightmare.skill.whiteflame.description: §7A flame of abnormal origin, like they were from the underworld itself, burning not the flesh—but the very soul.
trnightmare.skill.wind_blessing.descript: Swift and unseen, this blessing enhances evasion and agility, making you one with the wind.
trnightmare.skill.wind_evasion.descripti: Harnesses wind currents to instinctively avoid attacks. Movement becomes reactive and unpredictable.
trnightmare.skill.wind_reading.descripti: Read the flow of battle like the wind itself. Improves reaction speed and awareness of enemy actions.
trnightmare.skill.xaligha.cult_save: §cA cultist dies in your place. Their devotion is not in vain.
trnightmare.skill.xaligha.description: An ultimate skill that infects the minds of others through madness. Wields delusion, control, and insanity to warp the spiritual nature of all beings. Grants power over cults, spiritual erosion, and forbidden pacts.
trnightmare.tyche.crit: ✨ CHAOS STRIKE! ✨ That one was a doozy!
trnightmare.tyche.death: Haha—amazing! You died! Again! I love this show.
trnightmare.tyche.eat.0: Eating that? Bold. Suicidal, but bold.
trnightmare.tyche.eat.1: What if I cursed your snack? Just kidding! Or am I?
trnightmare.tyche.kill.lucky: That one was rigged. But we take it!
trnightmare.tyche.roll.1: Aha! I have no clue what that did. FUN!
trnightmare.tyche.roll.3: Why'd you flinch? That was just... luck.
trnightmare.tyche.roll.4: Next roll's the big one. I feel it.
trnightmare.tyche.roll.5: Ohoho~ rotten luck, love. Try again?
trnightmare.vehement.eat.weak: You feed like a coward. Where’s your hunger?
trnightmare.vehement.hunt.assigned: You. Find and end %s. Their blood is mine.
trnightmare.vehement.hunt.success: %s has fallen. Their screams pleased me.
trnightmare.vehement.idle.kill_thirst: The blood is still... you disappoint me.
trnightmare.vehement.kill.player_reward: Yes... That was GLORIOUS. Do it again!
trnightmare.vehement.kill.weak: Barely a kill. You’re wasting my time.
trnightmare.vehement.snark.block_break: Digging? Hah. You should be drawing blood.
trnightmare.vehement.snark.death: Pathetic. You die before you feast.
